title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
summary_full: Tehran says its armed forces are ready "with their fingers on the trigger" to respond to any aggression.
summary_public: Tehran says its armed forces are ready "with their fingers on the trigger" to respond to any aggression.
